name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for the accessory. It will be used as the accessory name in HomeKit.

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Your API key for calling aqicn, you can get one free from https://aqicn.org/data-platform/token/

location_gps.title: GPS Location
location_gps.description: Latitude and longitude of your location, you can find that at http://www.mapcoordinates.net/en

polling_minutes.title: Polling Minutes
polling_minutes.description: Number of minutes between updates, polling disabled if no entry.

inactive_hours.title: Inactive Hours
inactive_hours.description: Number of hours before sensor is marked inactive. Set to 0 to always show active.
